system.prerequisites: Dis is Takin' Too Long, Frazzle
system.sustained: The Weirdboy teleports themselves and Psy Rating Ork allies within range up to 10 x Psy Rating metres. Each Ork must make separate +0 Willpower Test or be stunned for the next round as they vomit from the experience. Anyone that fails the test by 3+ Degrees of Failiure also gains 1d5 Insanity Points.
